alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:52AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lipscomb, northern Hemphill and east central Ochiltree Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 352 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Wolf Creek Park, or 13 miles southwest of Lipscomb, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canadian, Glazier and Lake Marvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
